item.title: Trump appears with Italian Prime Minister Meloni at his Florida club
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump made an appearance with Italian Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni, who was visiting his Mar-a-Lago club

item.title: Jimmy Carter updates: Former president to remain in Atlanta through Tuesday
item.description: The funeral ceremonies for former President Jimmy Carter are underway. His body was transferred from his hometown of Plains, Georgia, to Atlanta.
